ProductInfo.Features:
•Premium quality Pre-made Siamese Cable with both BNC and Power Connectors for Ultimate Performance
•The 75 Ohm video conductor is surrounded by a heavy braided shield that provides maximum protection from stray RF (radio frequency), digital processing and radiated power signals
•Easy connection from a CCTV/Surveillance Camera to a Digital Video Recorder (DVR) and Power Supply
•Simplify installation by using a single cable for both power and video
LOT OF 2 FREE 2 RCA ADAPTERS WITH EACH CABLE
